publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-986 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Office of the Clerk-That the Parliament agrees that between 3 July 2004 and 7 January 2005 the office of the Clerk shall be open all days except: Saturdays and Sundays, 3 December 2004, 24 December 2004 (pm), 27 and 28 December 2004 and 3 and 4 January 2005. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
